Framework
Class DisplayObject

java.lang.Object
  Framework.DisplayObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDisplayObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bubble, Pet
public class DisplayObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisplayObject

The DisplayObject contains all the data for displaying something by a Core instance. Programmed by Dr Marc Price, refactored by Kristopher Randle.

Version:
18-12-2020
Author:
Marc Price & Kristopher Randle

validateModel

public boolean validateModel(java.lang.String m)
                      throws InvalidImageFileException
METHOD: Used to check that the String model that was provided is an accepted image type.

Parameters:
m - The model filepath that was provided on creation of the DisplayObject.
Returns:
A true boolean value if the instantiated model is valid.
Throws:
InvalidImageFileException

validateTexture

public boolean validateTexture(java.lang.String t)
                        throws InvalidImageFileException
METHOD: Used to check that the String texture that was provided is an accepted image type.

Parameters:

Returns:
